fields.text: Attacks with a series of rapid thrusts using a Javelin or Spear class weapon.
Release electrical Energy stealing and regenerate Mana.
Synergies: Thunder God's Wrath, Lightning Fury

Changes a thrown javelin into a powerful
bolt of lightning that splits on impact.
Synergies: Recharge, Charged Strike, Lightning Strike
Strike you foes with lethal venom laced javelin. Gather Charges of Damage, Poison Damage and Poison Length Resistance.
Adds lightning damage to javelin class weapons and releases charged bolts upon impact.
Synergies: Recharge, Thunder God's Wrath, Lightning Fury
Magically enhances your javelin to release expanding clouds of poison upon impact.
Increases attack damage but rapidly degrades the weapon.
Adds lightning damage to javelin class weapons and releases chain lightning upon impact.
Synergies: Recharge, Thunder God's Wrath, Lightning Fury
Raise your javelin to the heavens and  call down the wrath of the Thunder God.
Synergies: Recharge, Charged Strike, Lightning Strike
Attacks all adjacent targets with added magic damage.
Illuminates nearby enemies making them easier to hit for you and your party.
Huntress Buff - Increased movement and attack speed but reduces defence and attack rating.
Huntress Buff - Greatly increased attack rating and damage but reduces movement speed and attack speed.
Creates a duplicate of yourself that draws fire from enemies and explodes upon death.
Synergies: Decoy, Penetrate, Evasive Tactics, Huntress Haste
Creates a magical arrow or bolt that does extra damage and steals mana.
Magically enhances your arrow or bolt to freeze your enemies. Always hits.
Magically splits one arrow into several fire arrows that target multiple nearby enemies.
Synergies: Curtain of Fire, Exploding Arrow
Magically splits one arrow or bolt into many.
Magically enhances an arrow or bolt to freeze entire groups of monsters. Always hits.
Synergies: Cold Arrow, Hail of Arrows
Enchants an arrow or bolt that explodes on contact, damaging all nearby enemies, Always hits.
Enhances your arrows to track your target or seek one of its own.
Call forth a storm of arrows and ice.
Let loose an arrow that blazes a trail of fire and unleashes a meteor strike on anything it contacts.
Fire an arrow imbued with the power of the magic and three elements.
